text: Olav Skjevesland (31 May 1942 â€“ 8 September 2019) was Norwegian theologian and priest. He was the Bishop of the Diocese of Agder og Telemark from 1998 until his retirement in 2012. During his time as a bishop, he was thought to be theologically conservative and he was opposed to letting gay priests serve in the church. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Lutheran bishops Category:Christian theologians Category:Norwegian people
title: Olav Skjevesland
